Title: Think Global, Act Local: The Influence of Environment 
       Age and Host Mass on Type Ia Supernova Light Curves 
Authors: Rose B.M., Garnavich P.M., Berg M.A. 
Table: Local environment data for Campbell et al. (2013) SNIa
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: apjab0704t1_mrt.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units   Label  Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  5 I5     ---     SDSS   SDSS Identifier
   7- 14 F8.6   ---     z      Spectroscopic redshift
  16- 19 F4.2   10-5  e_z      Uncertainty in z
  21- 24 F4.1   mag     umag   SDSS u band magnitude
  26- 29 F4.1   mag     gmag   SDSS g band magnitude
  31- 34 F4.1   mag     rmag   SDSS r band magnitude
  36- 39 F4.1   mag     imag   SDSS i band magnitude
  41- 44 F4.1   mag     zmag   SDSS z band magnitude
  46- 49 F4.2   mag   e_umag   Uncertainty in umag
  51- 54 F4.2   mag   e_gmag   Uncertainty in gmag
  56- 59 F4.2   mag   e_rmag   Uncertainty in rmag
  61- 64 F4.2   mag   e_imag   Uncertainty in imag
  66- 69 F4.2   mag   e_zmag   Uncertainty in zmag
  71- 75 F5.2   mag     HR     Best-fit linear regression value
  77- 81 F5.3   mag   e_HR     Uncertainty in HR
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
